titles.title: Recognizing and honoring the commitment and sacrifices of military families of the United States.
Recognizing and honoring the commitment and sacrifices of military families of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary:
Recognizes the commitment and ever-increasing sacrifices military families make every day during the current era of protracted conflict.
Honors the families of the Armed Forces and thanks them for their dedication and service to the United States.
Encourages the citizens of the United States to recognize, commemorate, and honor the role and contribution of the military family.
